document.full_text: when a doctor thoughtlessly dresses down a nurse in front of patients or their families, it's not just a personal affront, it's an incredible distraction, taking our minds away from our patients, focusing them instead on how powerless we are, writes nurse theresa brown.
document.title: belittling the nurse
